questions.question: Stadia levelling is a modified form of:
The cross-hair in a telescope are fitted.

answers.b: At the centre of the telescope
answers.d: At the optical centre of eye piece

questions.question: In _________ levelling, the first and last point are at a far distance.
The angle of field of the telescope

answers.a: is independent of the size of the object glass
answers.b: increases as the size of the eye piece increases
answers.c: decreases as the distance between eye piece and object increases
